title: Is it time to migrate to dota 2?

replies.body:
Have you heard of Battlerite? is a really good moba! i recommend it.

There are so many different spells for every single champ and some spells require energy, all this with tactics makes it a really mechanical game

there is also no minions, its a MOBA, Multiplayer online batter arena not a MOFA, Multiplayer online farming arena
Don't worry league can be hard to get the hang of. Maybe try Heroes of the Storm first to get used to MOBAs?
lols actually the easiest /ezmode out of the classical moba list but ok not ok
I tried dota 2, its just as worse, community, game length, gameplay. Its horrid.

maybe but dota sucks ive played it
the queue times are soooo long and its hard to learn
Only if you can speak Russian.
Hey buddy, Remember Me? IM ON YOUR "LIST"
